scene_description_enriched: The image depicts Saint John the Baptist in a forest setting, characterized by stylized trees with green foliage and blue sky. He is shown with a beard, long brown hair, and a golden halo. He wears a rough, golden-brown garment and a red cloak draped over his left shoulder. His right hand points towards a white lamb, which he cradles in his left arm. The lamb also has a golden halo, signifying its importance. The overall impression is one of solemnity and spiritual contemplation.
